source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Gamification: How to Level Up Your Life and Business
items.headline: Comprehensive gamification course covering everything from principles to mechanics and the psychology behind game design
objectives_summary: Easily add game mechanics to your life and business
Increase productivity with game elements
Boost customer loyalty with psychological triggers

items.title: Creative writing for kids: write a spy story!
items.headline: Get your children to enjoy creative writing at home / home school with this thrilling course. Creative homeschooling.
objectives_summary: KNOW the techniques good writers use
UNDERSTAND how to plot a story and develop characters
And ENJOY writing a compelling spy thriller!

items.title: Abstract Painting Vertical Theme
items.headline: Learn How to Create Abstract Paintings with a Vertical Theme
objectives_summary: How to create gorgeous abstract paintings with a vertical theme.

items.title: Screenwriting Masterclass: Crafting Complex Characters

visible_instructors.title: Karl Iglesias

items.headline: Learn the Write Rich, Complex Characters That Connect with an Audience in Your Screenwriting, Filmmaking & Film School!
objectives_summary: You'll enhance your character development across genres
Strong character development will evoke emotions in your audience

items.title: Mastering Thinking Skills Vol 2: Become a Creative Genius
items.headline: Reverse Engineering the mental frameworks that geniuses from Jobs to Da Vinci used to dominate their fields.
objectives_summary: Learn the Language of Metaphors
Develop Industry-Shifting Innovation Skills
Deconstruct the Strategies of the Most Successful Geniuses of History

items.headline: Complete guide to writing an amazing short script using productivity skills practiced in all great writing.
objectives_summary: Write a great short film script
Write a script like a Pro!
Avoid the common pitfalls

items.title: Acting MASTERCLASS: Be a Working Actor and Book Auditions!

visible_instructors.name: GB
visible_instructors.title: GB Voice Academy

items.headline: Step-by-Step Acting Guide on Making It as a Working Actor
objectives_summary: Build a strong and reliable  acting technique that BOOKS JOBS!
Acting for the camera
How to effectively practice acting everyday

items.title: Amazon Self-publishing: Self-publish a Kindle/Paperback Book
items.headline: Self-publishing Kindle eBooks and paperbacks on Amazon: Self-publish your book and cover: Enter KDP Select vs SmashWords
objectives_summary: You'll learn why you should self-publish exclusively with Amazon
How to format your manuscript for Kindle eBook publication using Microsoft Word
How to publish your manuscript on Kindle eBook using KDP

items.title: Magic Masterclass for Card Tricks and Magic Tricks
items.headline: An expert professional magician teaches you the basic magic principles for great magic tricks & impressive card tricks
objectives_summary: Perform impressive but easy to do magic tricks with cards, coins and other objects
Have the background knowledge of magic techniques to be able to create your own tricks.

items.title: Learn How to Direct a Film with Adrian Mead

visible_instructors.job_title: An Online Film School and Community
visible_instructors.name: GetFilming
visible_instructors.title: GetFilming Film School

items.headline: You will learn everything you need to know to direct Film, TV and many other types of media.
objectives_summary: Direct a Short Film or Feature Film.
Understand the job of the Director, what they do and how they get results.
Learn how to apply this knowledge to all media, like Radio and Animation.

items.title: Screenwriting 101: How to Write Screenplay Description
items.headline: The ultimate, no-nonsense guide to writing awesome screenplay description.
objectives_summary: Have a greater understanding of what good screenwriting sounds like - and what it doesn't sound like
Write screenplay description with visual precision and professional craftsmanship
Craft screenplay prose that gets noticed - and hopefully gets read

items.title: Traveler's Sketchbook 3: Drawing Buildings in Perspective
items.headline: A quick and easy approach for beginners who want to add perspective to their sketches or paintings.
objectives_summary: Learn a quick and easy way to create 1 Point, 2 Point and 3 Point Perspective Drawings.
Apply these quick and easy techniques to outdoor sketches.
Learn how to create realistic street and urban scenes with depth using linear perspective!

items.title: How to Write a Great Script with Final Draft 10
items.headline: (You Can Write a Screenplay Easier and Faster Than You Think)
objectives_summary: Turn an idea into a story outline
Organize a story using Final Draft
Write and edit a screenplay using Final Draft

items.title: Learn To Make Organic Handmade Soaps
items.headline: The Art of Herbal Soap Making
objectives_summary: Know History of Soap Making
Learn Science of Soap Making
Learn Soap Making Processes  Cold Process Soaps : with Infusions- Natural Colorants, & Pigments

items.title: Develop your CRITICAL THINKING skills - easily!
items.headline: Improve your study, work and decision-making skills with this practical and comprehensive guide to critical thinking
objectives_summary: Think critically like an expert
Recognise and frame problems
Build persuasive arguments
